title: Obama Talks Russia, Ukraine At G7 Summitt
teaser: President Obama said economic sanctions imposed on Russia will continue as long as fighting continues in Ukraine.
contentencoded:
NPR’s Ron Elving talks with Here & Now’s Robin Young about President Obama’s press conference this morning, in which he discussed relations and sanctions with Russia as well as the ongoing conflict with ISIS.

Guest

  • Ron Elving, senior Washington editor for NPR. He tweets @NPRrelving.
